about_the_game:
About the Game


Welcome to our flower shop! We have everything you need. Our roses will bring you happiness, peonies can soothe your toothache, and the orchid is a beautiful gift to the enemy because it kills.
Flower Shop is a game about a crazy florist who is just trying to pull off his night shift. The young man greets customers, makes bouquets, keeps the store clean, and at the same time he has to cope with his hallucinations.
His visions intertwine with equally frightening reality, and it’s up to the gamer to decide whether it’s a fact or a product of the florist’s sick imagination.

Rules Of the Game


  • Follow the orders of the clients and collect bouquets according to their requests. Remember - not all flowers are safe.
  • Explore objects. There’s a lot of weird stuff in the store.
  • Flirt with girls on the dating app. Just a bit of perseverance and you’ll definitely meet somebody!
  • Don't ever go to the basement.

name: Flower Shop
short_description: It is a hermetic horror that pretends to be your friend. The game begins at a flower shop. At first, it looks like a naive florist simulator. Gradually, the game pulls you into the abyss of madness.
